casebody.data:
Thursday, February 13, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

96-2870. Zaller v. Zaller.

Geauga App. Nos. 95-G-1949 and 96-G-1968. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and -a claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of lower court hearings,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of lower court hearings be, and hereby is, denied.
